code: import React from'react';import{Chart as chartData={labels:data.map(item=>item.label),datasets:[{label:yAxisLabel||'Τιμές',data:data.map(item=>item.value),backgroundColor:chartColor,borderColor:chartColor,borderWidth:1}]};const \u0393\u03C1\u03B1\u03C6\u03AE\u03BC\u03B1\u03C4\u03BF\u03C2"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{height:400},children:renderChart()})]});}export default ChartDisplay;
